doc.title: Best Food Find of 2007
doc.text: I/PRP am/VBP sure/JJ that/WDT you/PRP all/RB have/VBN found/VBN something/NN good/JJ to/TO eat/VB in/IN 2007/NN through/IN reading/NN this/DT blog/NN ./.
